Title: Tracking the Thieves
Description:
We WILL get to the bottom of this.

$n, you're coming with me. We'll search every inch of this city if we have to, but we'll find out how they took the bell... and where.

I'm picking up traces of arcane magic here... we need to follow the trail!
ObjectivesText: Help Jaina discover who took the Divine Bell, and where they took it. You may speak with Seamus Goldenkicks in Lion's Landing to be ported to Darnassus.

Objectives.Text: Track the Thieves of the Bell
